author: f*****e
comment:
Performance:Superb

Best RTX 3080 model ever. The card is 9.7/10, totally like new, the best condition of used EVGA FTW3 Ultra Gaming RTX 3080 in Shopee, fans and fins are clean, port plate no rust at all, only paint chips due to port screws.
